title: State of the Union Addresses promoted by Google
description_short: List of State of the Union addresses promoted by Google on its google.com homepage.
description_long:
On August 29, 2018, Donald Trump tweeted a video, with the hashtag #StopTheBias, that falsely claimed Google had stopped promoting the State of the Union address on its google.com homepage since he was elected the 45th President of the United States. This data set lists all the times Google has promoted the address since 2012. Google did not promoted Donald Trump's 2017 address because it was a joint statement to Congress, not a State of the Union address.

Sources:
Trump Claims Google Didn’t Promote His State Of The Union (Buzzfeed News)
Did Google Fail to Promote President Trump’s State of the Union Address? (Snopes)
Why Trump's Tuesday speech isn't a State of the Union address (28/02/2017) (CNN)
Tweets By @spdustin (twitter.com)
